item.title: Macquarie Pass: Mother-of-two Melinda Pickup killed by falling tree branch during severe NSW weather remembered as ‘exceptional scientist’

item.description: Authorities say funds have now been received for Jaques Moretti, following the New Year’s Day blaze killing 40 people and injuring more than 100.

item.description: The crowd favourite has been praised by his ‘honorary Aussie’ partner for his positivity.

item.description: The ‘modern-day Pablo Escobar’ had been on FBI’s ‘Ten Most Wanted’ for over a year.

item.title: Increasing EV competition not a concern for "unique" Polestar brand
item.description: Off the back of a strong year of sales growth, Polestar is confident it can fend off new electric rivals arriving from China and beyond.

item.title: Battle of the ute twins: Will the LDV Terron 9 or MG U9 be victorious?
item.description: This year will be the first full year of sales for the MG U9 and LDV Terron 9 ute twins. How do they compare, and which will be more popular?

item.title: Man arrested and charged with sexually assaulting a child on Melbourne street
item.description: A 53-year-old has been accused of targeting a young teenage girl while she waited at traffic lights.

item.description: ‘We’ve never needed them. We have never really asked anything of them.’

item.description: The Kia Sorento has gained new safety technology for 2026, though petrol-powered versions are being phased out.

item.description: The allrounder was left fuming after getting smashed for a boundary that could have been stopped.

item.title: Bugatti FKP Hommage: One-off melds Chiron W16 with Veyron's design
